articles.title: EU and U.S. end clash over steel and aluminium, take aim at China's 'dirty' steel - Reuters
articles.description: The United States and the European Union on Sunday ended a dispute over steel and aluminium tariffs and said they would work on a global arrangement to combat "dirty" production and overcapacity in the industry.
articles.content: ROME, Oct 31 (Reuters) - The United States and the European Union on Sunday ended a dispute over steel and aluminium tariffs and said they would work on a global arrangement to combat "dirty" product… [+2788 chars]

articles.title: EU and US look to gang up on China after trade war truce - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Brussels holds its nose to strike a ceasefire with Washington that it thinks is illegal.
articles.content: ROME Europe isn't thrilled about the terms of Saturday's trade truce with the U.S. but EU officials finally conceded it was worth accepting Washington's conditions in order to shift focus to the comm… [+5383 chars]

articles.author: Jan Cronje
articles.title: EU seeking to launch project to help SA phase out coal at COP26 climate summit - News24
articles.description: The European Union is looking to officially launch its project to help SA phase out coal at the COP26 climate summit which started on Sunday in Glasgow, Scotland.
articles.content:
The European Union is seeking to launch its project to help SA phase out coal at the COP26 climate summit which started on Sunday in Glasgow, Scotland.
